infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Echo needs camera access to capture photos of your activities, which can then be added to your memories.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Echo requires access to your photo library so you can select and add photos to the memories of the activities you're doing.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Echo needs microphone access to record audio of your activities, which can then be added to your memories.
